line.words: Jack ak pwa majik la.

subtitle.line: Jack and the Beanstalk
Jack and the Beanstalk

line.words: Sa se istwa yon ti gason. Bonjou! Kijan ou rele? Mwen rele Jack.

subtitle.line: This is the story of a boy. Hello! What’s your name? My name’s Jack.
This is the story of a boy. Hello! What’s your name? My name’s Jack.

line.words: Jack pòv... Manman pòv.... Jack ak manman l pòv, yo pòv anpil.

subtitle.line: Jack is poor… Mother is poor…. Jack and his mother are poor, very poor.
Jack is poor… Mother is poor…. Jack and his mother are poor, very poor.

line.words: Yo pa manje lèmaten... Yo pa manje manje lè midi... Yo pa manje manje aswè... Yo pa manje anyen ditou!

subtitle.line: Nothing for breakfast... Nothing for lunch… Nothing for supper… Nothing at all!
Nothing for breakfast... Nothing for lunch… Nothing for supper… Nothing at all!

line.words: Manman l di §Jak, an nou vann bèf la.§ Mou, mou, mou, mou, mou. §An al nan mache a. Depeche w! depeche w!§

subtitle.line: Mother says §Jack, let’s sell the cow.§ Moo, moo, moo, moo, moo. §Go to the market. Quick! Quick!§
Mother says §Jack, let’s sell the cow.§ Moo, moo, moo, moo, moo. §Go to the market. Quick! Quick!§

line.words: Jak ale nan mache a ak bèf la. Yo rankontre yon ti lepè. §Mwen ta renmen achte yon bèf. Men senk pwa majik. Yon ... de ... twa… kat… senk ...§

subtitle.line: Jack and the cow go to the market. They meet an old man. §I’d like to buy a cow. Here are five magic beans. One … two … three … four … five …§
Jack and the cow go to the market. They meet an old man. §I’d like to buy a cow. Here are five magic beans. One … two … three … four … five …§

line.words: Men, manman l di §Gade kijan ou sòt!§ Li pran pwa yo.... pwa majik yo ... Yon... de...twa... kat... senk... e li voye yo jete.

subtitle.line: But mother says §You are really stupid!§ She takes the beans …. the magic beans …One … two … three … four … five …And she throws them away.
But mother says §You are really stupid!§ She takes the beans …. the magic beans …One … two … three … four … five …And she throws them away.

line.words: Men, pandan lannwit lan, yon pye pwa pouse. Li pouse ... li pouse ... e li pouse ... Oh!

subtitle.line: But during the night, a magic beanstalk grows. And grows … and grows … and grows … Oh!
But during the night, a magic beanstalk grows. And grows … and grows … and grows … Oh!

line.words: Jak monte pye pwa majik la. Li monte ... li monte ... li monte ... jiskaske l rive nan syèl la. Jack wè yon gwo chato. Kow, kow, kow , kow, kow ... §Eske gen moun la?§

subtitle.line: Jack climbs the magic beanstalk. He climbs … he climbs … and he climbs … right up to the sky. Jack sees a huge castle. Knock, knock, knock, knock, knock … §Is anybody there?§
Jack climbs the magic beanstalk. He climbs … he climbs … and he climbs … right up to the sky. Jack sees a huge castle. Knock, knock, knock, knock, knock … §Is anybody there?§

line.words: Jack antre nan chato a. Li wè kèk pyès monnen lò, yon poul ak yon gita majik.

subtitle.line: Jack enters the castle. He sees some gold coins, a hen and a magic harp.
Jack enters the castle. He sees some gold coins, a hen and a magic harp.

line.words: Jeyan an parèt. Gwo, gwo gwo jeyan an. Jak kache. §Mwen pran sant yon ti gason!§ Men, li pa jwenn Jak.

subtitle.line: The giant appears. The big, big big giant. Jack hides. §I smell a boy!§ But he doesn’t find Jack.
The giant appears. The big, big big giant. Jack hides. §I smell a boy!§ But he doesn’t find Jack.

line.words: Jeyan kouche l dòmi. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jak pran chans pwoche an kachèt. Li pran pyès monnen lò yo.

subtitle.line: The giant falls asleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jack decides to creep in. He takes the gold coins.
The giant falls asleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jack decides to creep in. He takes the gold coins.

line.words: Jak glise desann pyebwa a ... desann ... desann ... desann. Epi apre sa?

subtitle.line: Jack slides down the beanstalk … down… down… down. And then?
Jack slides down the beanstalk … down… down… down. And then?

line.words: Jak monte pye pwa majik la. Li monte ... li monte ... li monte ... jiskaske l rive nan syèl la. Epi Jack antre nan chato a ... Li wè ... manman poul la ... ak gita majik la.

subtitle.line: Jack climbs the magic beanstalk. He climbs … he climbs … he climbs … right up to the sky. And Jack enters the castle … And he sees … the hen … and the magic harp.
Jack climbs the magic beanstalk. He climbs … he climbs … he climbs … right up to the sky. And Jack enters the castle … And he sees … the hen … and the magic harp.

line.words: Jeyan a parèt. Yon gwo, gwo gwo jeyan. Jak kache. §Mwen pran sant yon ti gason!§ Men, li pa jwenn Jak.

subtitle.line: The giant appears. The big, big giant. Jack hides. §I smell a boy.§ But he doesn’t find Jack.
The giant appears. The big, big giant. Jack hides. §I smell a boy.§ But he doesn’t find Jack.

line.words: Jeyan kouche l dòmi. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jak pran chans pwoche an kachèt. Li pran manman poul la.

subtitle.line: The giant falls asleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jack decides to creep in. He takes the hen.
The giant falls asleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jack decides to creep in. He takes the hen.

line.words: Jak glise desann pyebwa a ... li desann ... li desann ... li desann. Epi apre sa?

subtitle.line: Jack slides down the beanstalk … down… down… down. And then?
Jack slides down the beanstalk … down… down… down. And then?

line.words: Jak monte pye pwa majik la. Li monte ... li monte ... li monte ... jiskaske l rive nan syèl la. Epi Jack antre nan chato a ... Apre sa, li wè ... gita majik la.

subtitle.line: Jack climbs the magic beanstalk. He climbs … he climbs … he climbs … right up to the sky. And Jack enters the castle … And he sees … the magic harp.
Jack climbs the magic beanstalk. He climbs … he climbs … he climbs … right up to the sky. And Jack enters the castle … And he sees … the magic harp.

line.words: Jeyan a parèt. Yon gwo gwo gwo jeyan. Jak kache. §Mwen pran sant yon ti gason!§ Men, li pa jwenn Jak.

subtitle.line: The giant arrives. The big, big giant. Jack hides. §I smell a boy.§ But he doesn’t find Jack.
The giant arrives. The big, big giant. Jack hides. §I smell a boy.§ But he doesn’t find Jack.

line.words: Jeyan kouche l dòmi. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jak deside pran chans pwoche and kachèt. Li pran gita majik la.

subtitle.line: The giant falls asleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jack decides to creep in. He takes the magic harp.
The giant falls asleep. ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ. Jack decides to creep in. He takes the magic harp.

line.words: E sa konsa istwa a fini. Men, jeyan reveye. Li kouri dèyè Jak. Jak glise desann pye pwa a ... li desann ... li desann ... li desann. Men, jeyan swiv misye.

subtitle.line: And this is the end of the story. But the giant wakes up. The giant chases Jack. Jack slides down the beanstalk … down … down… and down. But the giant is coming after him.
And this is the end of the story. But the giant wakes up. The giant chases Jack. Jack slides down the beanstalk … down … down… and down. But the giant is coming after him.

line.words: Jak al chache yon rach. Vit! Vit! Jack koupe pye pwa a. Vit! Vit! Boum! ... Jeyan an tonbe ... Boum!

subtitle.line: Jack looks for an axe. Quick! Quick! Jack chops down the beanstalk. Quick! Quick! Crash! ... The giant falls … Crash!
Jack looks for an axe. Quick! Quick! Jack chops down the beanstalk. Quick! Quick! Crash! ... The giant falls … Crash!

line.words: Epi se te dènye jou jeyan an.

subtitle.line: And that’s the end of the giant.
And that’s the end of the giant.
